intro: Urena rigida, commonly known as rigid urena, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, pale yellow to greenish-white flowers. Its leaves are ovate to elliptic, with a rough texture, and it produces capsule fruits containing numerous seeds. Urena rigida is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in poor, sandy environments.
